thegame.screens

Class SettingsScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • thegame.screens.SettingsScreen

  • public class SettingsScreen
extends java.lang.Object
    Screen for adjusting game settings. Allows modification of audio volumes, visual settings, and other preferences.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SettingsScreen(App app)
      Creates a new settings screen.

    • Method Summary

      Handles mouse click events on settings controls.
      void handleMouseMove(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Updates the current mouse position and handles slider dragging.
      void handleMouseRelease(double mouseX, double mouseY)
      Handles mouse release events, ending slider dragging.
      void render()
      Renders the settings screen with all sliders, toggles, and buttons.
